description: You are given two integers numBottles and numExchange. numBottles represents the number of full water bottles that you initially have. In one operation, you can perform one of the following operations: Note that you cannot exchange multiple batches of empty bottles for the same value of numExchange. For example, if numBottles == 3 and numExchange == 1, you cannot exchange 3 empty water bottles for 3 full bottles. Return the maximum number of water bottles you can drink.
